text: $greeting$ $firstName$, and welcome to $company$! Room $roomNumber$ is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.
$greeting$ $firstName$, this message is to inform you that the breakfast at $company$ ends at 10:00am.
$greeting$ $firstName$, we received your request for room service for room $roomNumber$ at $company$.
$greeting$ $firstName$, we'd like to inform you that we expect you to check out the room $roomNumber$ at $company$ at 12:00pm tomorrow.
$greeting$ $firstName$, I'm contacting you from $company$ in $city$ regarding a found belonging in the room (room $roomNumber$) you stayed at. Please call us for more information.
